Progress log 5

Today I
* Fixed the infinite chunk bug, World.getChunk took global coordinates rather than chunk coordinates
* Fixed the placing tiles issue
* Added berry bushes
* Fixed rendering issues
* Fixed wall draw
* Fixed pine tree draw
* Created a template for rendering on upper and lower and helper functions
* Added makeshift day-night cycle
